Articles.Content:
I was checking Max's twitter, and I came across this:

![N2jGG.jpg](http://i.snag.gy/N2jGG.jpg)

Now, if anyone has played Homestuck ([mspaintadventures.com](http://mspaintadventures.com)) then they might get this...was this intentional? Speculation? Mmm?
Pretty much homestuck reference there. Homestuck did get continued pretty recently too, so probably.
